co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.table

Class RowColumns<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.table.RowColumns<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - implementor type - to support handy builder-like methods.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Delete, Get

    public abstract class RowColumns<T>
extends Object
    Base class for defining a row with set of columns.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RowColumns(byte[] row)
      Defines a row with all columns included.
      RowColumns(byte[] row, byte[]... columns)
      Defines a row, with the specified set of columns.
      RowColumns(String row)
      Defines a row with all columns included.
      RowColumns(String row, String... columns)
      Defines a row, including all columns, unless additional columns are specified.

    • Method Summary

      Specifies column(s) to be included.

      Specifies column(s) to be included.
      T add(String[] columns)
      Specifies column(s) to be included.
      T add(String firstColumn, String... moreColumns)
      Specifies column(s) to be included.

      byte[] getRow()

    • Constructor Detail

      • RowColumns

        public RowColumns(byte[] row)
        Defines a row with all columns included. If any of the add method is called, only columns specified through those add method calls are included.
        Parameters:
        row - the row to define.

      • RowColumns

        public RowColumns(byte[] row,
          byte[]... columns)
        Defines a row, with the specified set of columns.
        Parameters:
        row - the row to define
        columns - the set of columns of the row to included

      • RowColumns

        public RowColumns(String row)
        Defines a row with all columns included. If any of the add method is called, only columns specified through those add method calls are included.
        Parameters:
        row - the row to define. Note: It will be converted to byte[] with UTF-8 encoding.

      • RowColumns

        public RowColumns(String row,
          String... columns)
        Defines a row, including all columns, unless additional columns are specified. Note that the provided strings will be converted to byte[] with UTF-8 encoding.
        Parameters:
        row - the row to define
        columns - the set of columns of the row to included

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public T add(byte[] firstColumn,
    byte[]... moreColumns)
        Specifies column(s) to be included.
        Parameters:
        firstColumn - the first column being included
        moreColumns - a collection of additional columns being included
        Returns:
        the RowColumns object being defined

      • add

        public T add(byte[][] columns)
        Specifies column(s) to be included.
        Parameters:
        columns - a collection of columns being included
        Returns:
        the RowColumns object being defined

      • add

        public T add(String firstColumn,
    String... moreColumns)
        Specifies column(s) to be included. Note that the provided strings will be converted to byte[] with UTF-8 encoding.
        Parameters:
        firstColumn - the first column being included
        moreColumns - a collection of additional columns being included
        Returns:
        the RowColumns object being defined

      • add

        public T add(String[] columns)
        Specifies column(s) to be included.
        Parameters:
        columns - a collection of columns being included
        Returns:
        the RowColumns object being defined

      • getRow

        public byte[] getRow()
        Returns:
        the row that was included

      • getColumns

        @Nullable
public List<byte[]> getColumns()
        Returns:
        a list of columns of this object. null indicates ALL columns.
